description: This file defines an ASP.NET Core Web API controller named AuthController, which provides endpoints for user registration and login, utilizing dependency-injected authentication service.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: API controller handling authentication-related endpoints for registration and login, dependent on IAuthService.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Handles user registration by accepting registration data and returning a JWT token and user info.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Handles user login by accepting login credentials and returning a JWT token and user info.
